effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item.  On the following turn, the holder will act first among moves with the same priority, regardless of Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP when using a move to go first.

flavor_text_entries.text: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it will be able to move first just once when it’s in a pinch.
